subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Just the chamber and speaker
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
When I first "got" the idea for the box, using a chamber was poionted out
to me kinda telepathicly. It seems to function as a space where the sound
can be manipulated easier by the entities, and using different materials
seems to get different levels. When I use aluminum, that seems to facilitate
ET contact more often than not using the chamber. Using pipe helps make the
chambers smaller. Thre seems to be a filtering effect by the chamber that
tends to enhance the voices. Most of the boxes I make have an option to use
the chambers.

 The mind contact that poined out the chamber--I think--was that shadow guy
on the group home page.

 F-S
